Package processing

package processing
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    processing.style
     
    processing.work
     
  • Class
    Description
    AllowanceType
    The AllowanceType enumeration allows expanding the traditional boolean logic to also include an "If Necessary" type.
    Assessor
    The Assessor class represents an assessor of the user's document.
    Author
    Represents the author of a type of work represented by a first and last name.
    DocumentType
    The DocumentType enumeration declares the allowed document types that a document can have.
    NumerationPosition
    The numeration position class determines where the page numbers are located
    NumerationType
    The numeration type class determines in which numeration system the numbers are displayed.
    Processor
    The processor class translates the AST given by the Parser to actual objects that can be used when creating the document
    Publication
    Specifies information about the publication of a work The most essential information are the publication name (for example, the name of the publisher of a book), the date (for example, the year it was published), the location (for example, in which country it has been published), and roles of other people than the author (for example, editors, directors, screenwriters, etc.)
    Role
    Represents a role of a person having worked on a work other than the author
    StructureType
    The StructureType enumeration declares all structural keywords that can be used in Pipp.
    WhitespaceAllowanceType
    The Whitespace Allowance Type determines whether the user is allowed to use whitespace characters in sentences or if it should be automatically removed.
